rules_text:
When Junktrawler enters, create a tapped colorless Powercell artifact token with “{T}: Add {C}.”
Tap another untapped artifact you control: Junktrawler gets +1/+1 until end of turn.
flavor_text:
[i]“We're out of spare parts? Send the retrieval unit to another abandoned city.”
— Merana, Grand Artificer[/i]
